Lincoln climbs up the stairs to his room, a disgruntled look on his face. Needless to say he did not have a good day at school today.
Closing the door behind him, he flops onto bed. He remained there for a few moments before facing the readers.

Lincoln: Before you ask, yes, I had a rough day at school today. Lucky thing my sisters are busy at the moment, I don’t want another case of meddling again. But I know what you’re thinking, “if you don’t want your sisters to meddle in again, what else are you gonna do?” There’s only one Other thing that can cheer Me up at a time like this...

He reaches under his bed and pulls out...
1111.title: Rough day at school

11111.content:
Lincoln pulls out a box of thick, puffy tape-on diapers. He opens the box up and pulls out a diaper. He blushes as he presses it making it crinkle and ripple. He turns to the readers.

Lincoln: Yes, I might as well say it, I’ve been wearing diapers lately. It’s nothing embarrassing mind you, I only do this when I’m really stressed out. Do my sisters know this? Actually no. If they find out, I’ll never here the end of this, what with Lori planning to post pictures and Lola being a tattletale. It’s better to do this in private.

He takes off his pants and underwear and slips into his diaper, putting powder on and taping it up. Lincoln giggles at the feeling of his puffy powdery diaper rubbing against his bottom. He then takes out some toys and a pacifier and begins his baby time.

For the next fifteen minutes he just sat there, sucking on his pacifier and playing with bun bun and some other toys. He soon felt more relaxed and forgot all about his lousy day today.

Lincoln: ahh, I feel better already. These diapers are once again lifesavers. Of course it’s not compete without some fresh milk or juice to drink.

He sneaks out into the hallway and was about to go downstairs to get a drink when suddenly he heard something. He looks down and sees lily, starting up at him. They both froze. The youngest loud just sat there until she spoke.

Lily: Winky?
Lincoln: Uh lily, there’s nothing to see here. Just let me pass through and...
Lily: winky diapee!
Lincoln: shhhh! Not so loud!

But lily continues to babble and giggle, seeing her big brother wearing a diaper was so amusing to her. Lincoln was panicking, he was gonna get caught if he didn’t do something! But before he could dash downstairs...

The sogginess was followed by a silent but deadly fart that pushes out some small logs of poop. Lincoln panics. He couldn’t Let his friend see that he had messed himself! Quickly, he excuses himself, runs upstairs to the bathroom and closes The door behind him.
He sits down, blushing as his diaper squished, grabs some wipes and powder, and goes to work and changes himself. info.brief_description: Pick a character from The Loud House to Wear and Use Diapers
info.description:
Greetings, this is an interactive story where you can pick your favorite character from Nickeloden's The Loud House to wear and use diapers. There are many paths you can take but the rules are that you can't do anything sexual and good grammar and paragraph posts are recommended. Also, Lily will be excluded from this Interactive Story for the obvious fact that she's a baby and is diapered to begin with. Just mind the rules below and use your imagination.

WARNING: This story uses elements relating to diapers, diaper usage, and even a little babying. If this isn't your interest then do not venture any further.

Rules:
-No adults getting diapered, only the kids and teens can be
-No sexual stuff
-No blood
-No gore
-No DEATHS!!!
-No Vore
-Have good grammer
-Keep posts lengthy. No short one-sentence posts over and over again.
-Only use characters shown in The Loud House.
